benchmark_details.name: StyleEval
benchmark_details.overview: StyleEval is a large-scale dataset for stylized dialogue generation, comprising 38 styles and 24,728 dialogues, constructed to enable more engaging and personalized dialogue agents utilizing large language models.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To facilitate the training and evaluation of LLMs in generating stylized dialogues across various stylistic dimensions.

data.source: Generated using the GPT-4 model and human quality control.
data.annotation: Quality checked through rigorous human-led verification.

methodology.calculation: Metrics computed based on overlap between generated and reference dialogues.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better alignment with stylistic and contextual nuances.
methodology.baseline_results: Compared against various models including LLaMA and ChatGPT.
methodology.validation: The dataset was tested on in-domain and out-of-domain scenarios to validate generalization capabilities.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Data sampled from DailyDialog and verified to not contain harmful information.
